## Installation

You can install **psmineR** from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/) with:

```{r cran-installation, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("psmineR")
```

### Development Version

You can install the development version of **psmineR** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("bupaverse/psmineR")
```
